maintainer.description: If you have any issues, please contact me, or try to find me in IRC on Freenode
maintainer.name: Andrey G. Antonov (andrex)

pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Common Desktop Environment was created by a collaboration of Sun, HP, IBM, DEC, SCO, Fujitsu and Hitachi. Used on a selection of commercial UNIXs, it is now available as open-source software for the first time.
